column1: court_fashion_acceptable_desc0:"Courtiers turn heads when they visit towns and cities."
court_fashion_decent_desc0:"Courtiers nimbly update their wardrobe with the seasons
column2: abandoning old garments when a new style catches on."
this court's styles spread across the world and influences other courts."

column1: court_fashion_fantastic_desc0:"This court is considered a stylistic innovator. Servants dress like other realms' rulers
column2: and their liege will be immortally known for their dress sense."

column1: court_food_quality_default_desc0:"No one looks forward to eating in this court
column2: but it is said the company makes up for it."

column1: court_food_quality_modest_desc0:"Guests are well-fed with adequate local cuisine."
court_food_quality_decent_desc0:"This court is able to provide occasional novel delicacies."
court_food_quality_lavish_desc0:"A fleet of chefs provide a constant supply of tasty morsels. A servant with a platter of food follows any gathering party of guests."
court_food_quality_exotic_desc0:"Servants are sent to foreign lands and return with bountiful exotic foods. There is no culinary delight which hasn't passed through these halls."
court_lodging_standards_default_desc0:"There are occasional diplomatic incidents when guests are asked to lodge together."
court_lodging_standards_small_desc0:"There is space for any courtier to have their own room."
court_lodging_standards_spacious_desc0:"Any inhabitants of this court can expect a suite of rooms."
court_lodging_standards_grand_desc0:"Guests know they can request any luxuries within their lodgings. Any book for their study
column2: any late-night drink - rooms are attended at every hour."

column1: court_servants_default_desc0:"This court's handful of servants are exhausted meeting every guest's demand."
court_servants_few_desc0:"This court has servants who can provide almost every crucial comfort."
court_servants_some_desc0:"This court has specialized servants who take pride in their work."
court_servants_many_desc0:"This court has a servant for every purpose one could construe."
court_servants_endless_desc0:"This court has more servants than anyone knows what to do with. It takes a concerted effort to do the simplest task without servants requesting to undertake it for you."
court_lodgings_small_inspirations0:"Completed [inspiration|E] quality has a small chance of improvement"
court_lodgings_middling_inspirations0:"Completed [inspiration|E] quality has a chance of improvement"
court_lodgings_spacious_inspirations0:"Completed [inspiration|E] quality has a decent chance of improvement"
court_lodgings_grand_inspirations0:"Completed [inspiration|E] quality has a good chance of improvement"

owner_court_lodgings_spacious0:"[guests|E] are more likely to stay longer\n$EFFECT_LIST_BULLET$[guest|E] acceptance to join your schemes in your court as an [agent|E]: #P +15#!"
owner_court_lodgings_grand0:"[guests|E] are most likely to stay longer\n$EFFECT_LIST_BULLET$[guest|E] acceptance to join your schemes in your court as an [agent|E]: #P +20#!"
